Welcome to InternHunt!

1. Eligibility: Only users who are 18 years or older may apply for internships.

2. Account: Users must provide accurate information. Sharing accounts is prohibited.

3. Application Process: We are not responsible for the selection decisions of companies.

4. Data Privacy: Your data will be used only for internship matching and notifications.

5. Prohibited Conduct: Users must not submit false information or spam companies.

6. Termination: We may suspend or terminate accounts violating our rules.

By using InternHunt, you agree to these terms and conditions.

Welcome to InternHunt!

1. Information Collection: We collect information you provide during registration and usage, including name, email, and preferences.

2. Usage of Information: Collected information is used only to match you with relevant internships and send notifications.

3. Data Sharing: We do not share your personal information with third parties without your consent, except for legal requirements.

4. Cookies & Analytics: We may use cookies and analytics to improve the app experience.

5. Security: We implement reasonable measures to protect your data but cannot guarantee complete security.

6. Changes to Policy: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Continued use of the app indicates acceptance of changes.

By using InternHunt, you agree to this privacy policy.
